alert.note: Alert for Bee (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 7:09PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN BEE COUNTY THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 709 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beeville, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Beeville and Skidmore. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 590 and 602. US Highway 59 between mile markers 692 and 704. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
